${ModID}:Whirligig.NAME: Whirligig
${ModID}:Whirligig.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy for each enemy in combat.

${ModID}:Sliiiiither.NAME: Sliiiiither
${ModID}:Sliiiiither.DESCRIPTION: Next turn, draw !M! to 3 additional cards.

${ModID}:TailFlail.NAME: Tail Flail
${ModID}:TailFlail.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! to !${ModID}:sd! damage to ALL enemies. NL Randomize the cost of !M! random cards.

${ModID}:Sneckpot.NAME: Sneckpot
${ModID}:Sneckpot.DESCRIPTION: Deal 1 to !D! damage. Roll the damage X times and take the highest result.

${ModID}:WhipNSnapper.NAME: Whip 'n Snapper
${ModID}:WhipNSnapper.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !${ModID}:m2! to !M! Weak and !${ModID}:m2! to !M! Vulnerable.

${ModID}:Twitch.NAME: Twitch
${ModID}:Twitch.DESCRIPTION: Randomize the cost of !M! cards. NL stslib:Persist !stslib:persist!.
${ModID}:Twitch.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Randomize the cost of up to !M! cards. NL stslib:Persist !stslib:persist!.

${ModID}:Gulp.NAME: Meal Prep
${ModID}:Gulp.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each energy this card costs.

${ModID}:SnazzySwagger.NAME: Snazzy Swagger
${ModID}:SnazzySwagger.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s}. NL Randomize the cost of all cards in your hand. NL Discard !M! card{!M!|>1=s}.

${ModID}:SneckoEyes.NAME: Snecko Eyes
${ModID}:SneckoEyes.DESCRIPTION: Become Confused. At the start of your turn, draw 2 cards.
${ModID}:SneckoEyes.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, draw 2 cards. NL Startup: Become Confused.

${ModID}:Shedding.NAME: Shedding
${ModID}:Shedding.DESCRIPTION: {@@}At the start of your turn, randomize the cost of the {!M!|>1=!M! highest cost cards|@=highest cost card} in your hand.
